I
t was revealed that the appellant is the father of 2 small children.   He was convicted and
sentenced  on  21.09.2016.  For  nearly  6  years  he  is  inside  the  prison  and  therefore  if  his
sentence  is  backdated  to  21.09.2016  the  appellant  would  be  able  to  unite  with  his  family
Considering  the  circumstances  of  the  case,  we  direct  the  two  sentences  (7  years  rigorous
imprisonment  and  10  years  rigorous  imprisonment)  to  run  concurrently,  with  effect  from
Subject to the said alteration this Appeal is dismissed.
